English: (TCM) the four methods of diagnosis, namely `望診~|`望~诊[wang4 zhen3] (observation), `聞診~|闻诊[wen2 zhen3] (auscultation and olfaction), `問診~|问诊[wen4 zhen3] (interrogation), `切診~|`切~诊[qie4 zhen3] (pulse feeling and palpation)

(TCM) the four methods of diagnosis, namely `望診~|`望~诊[wang4 zhen3] (observation), `聞診~|闻诊[wen2 zhen3] (auscultation and olfaction), `問診~|问诊[wen4 zhen3] (interrogation), `切診~|`切~诊[qie4 zhen3] (pulse feeling and palpation)
